features.label: Features
features.title: Our top features
features.description: Packed with powerful features to elevate your online meetings.

data.title: Group chat
data.description: Participants can send text messages to everyone in the meeting, making communication seamless. It allows instant sharing of information, questions, and discussions without disrupting the speaker. Emojis and file sharing within the chat make interactions more engaging and efficient.

data.title: Basic
data.description: Regular license with 6 months support

data.title: Advanced

data.title: Extended

howItWorks.label: How it Works
howItWorks.title: Get Started in Minutes
howItWorks.description: Set up and start hosting video conferences effortlessly.

data.title: Purchase & Install
data.description: Buy JupiterMeet from CodeCanyon. Set up a VPS (minimum 2GB RAM) and install the script using the provided auto-installation shell script. If you need help, you can opt for professional installation services.

data.title: Customize & Configure
data.description: White-label the platform by adding your logo, colors, and branding from the admin panel. Configure meeting settings, SMTP for emails, and security features like reCAPTCHA and password protection. Enable or disable features like recording, chat, and screen sharing as per your needs.

data.title: Start Hosting Meetings
data.description: Create an instant meeting or schedule one and send invites via email. Share the meeting link with participants and start a secure, high-quality video call. Enjoy features like screen sharing, chat, whiteboard, and recording with no third-party restrictions.

gallery.label: Gallery
gallery.title: App Screenshots (slider)
gallery.description: Explore JupiterMeet's clean and intuitive interface.

data.title: Mobile friendly
data.description: Anim aute id magna aliqua ad ad non deserunt sunt. Qui irure qui lorem cupidatat commodo.

data.title: No Third-Party APIs or Usage Fees
data.description: JupiterMeet is fully self-hosted, meaning no hidden costs or per-minute charges. Enjoy unlimited meetings without worrying about expensive subscriptions. Since it runs on your own VPS, you have complete control over your infrastructure.

data.title: End-to-End Encryption
data.description: Your video meetings are fully encrypted, ensuring maximum security and privacy. No third-party access—your data remains completely under your control. Perfect for confidential business discussions, telemedicine, and secure collaborations.

data.title: 100% White-Label & Customizable
data.description: Easily brand the platform with your logo, colors, and domain name. Modify features, UI, and workflows to suit your business needs. Unlike Google Meet or Zoom, it feels like your own professional video solution.

faqs.label: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.title: Got Questions? We've Got Answers!
faqs.description: Find answers to the most common questions about JupiterMeet.

data.title: Which kind of servers do I need?
data.description: You will need a VPS with at least 2 GB of RAM. Ubuntu 18.04 and CentOS 7 are preferred.

data.title: From where I can buy this script?
data.description: You can directly buy it from the above Envato Market/CodeCanyon link.

data.title: Do I need to pay any third-party API or services for video meetings?
data.description: No, JupiterMeet is developed using the browser's native APIs. So, you don't need to subscribe to any services.

data.title: How can I make money from this?
data.description: You can create subscription plans and configure payment modules. The users will need to pay a monthly or yearly recurring fee directly to you. Stripe and PayPal are integrated. An extended license is required to make money from this script.

data.title: Can I set my own logo and color?
data.description: Yes, you can rebrand the entire web application from the admin panel. Where you can set your logo, brand color, and intro texts.
